answers.answer: It's good to hear that life is getting smoother for your mum et al. However, this is a forum where people ask question/s on type 2 diabetes then get support answers when available. For blogs you use Journal Entries in your Profile page. Did you forget to ask your question?

question: my brother was 17 months old when he was diagnosed with diabetes (type 1) and i was 20 months we are both now 14 and 15 my mum says it was a struggle to have two so young but it's getting easier now!
title: new diabetics
